text.0: greenhued as one who giveth strength flow on for gods to drink a draught.
text.1: for vāyu and the marut host.
text.2: o pavamana sent by song roaring about thy dwellingplace.
text.3: pass into vāyu as law bids.
text.4: the steer shines with the deities dear sage in his appointed home.
text.6: taking each beauteous form he goes desirable while purified.
text.8: to indra soma flows the red engendering song exceeding wise.
text.10: flow best exhilarator sage flow to the filter in a stream.
text.11: to seat thee in the place of song.
